meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7435.

div.div: Clip of this game shown on the 2019-04-04 episode of Better Things.

td.p: Ryan VanderYacht, a substitute teacher and stay-at-home dad from Lake Forest, California
Kate Gran, an attorney from East Northport, New York
Mukund Marathe, a music teacher and singer from Montclair, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,400)

tr.td: THE GUMMELIER
THE LEADERS & BEST
"HAPPY" NEW YEAR
COAST
DOVE
WHAT'S YOUR FAVORITE SOAP?

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
